title: Bernin' through Super Tuesday: Kasie Hunt, Leah Askarinam with Stu Rothenberg
description: For some unknown number of candidates, Tuesday night — the tenth Democratic debate — was probably their last time on the stage. NBC's Kasie Hunt, Hotline Editor Leah Askarinam and Inside Elections' Stu Rothenberg join Chuck Todd to analyze Bernie Sanders' staying power at the top of the pile and how Super Tuesday will shake out for everyone else.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)

itunes:summary: Prepare to say goodbye to many 2020 Democrats.
